reviewText: 'thats what i like about the south'. now that is real rap boys and girls. all these new hip hoppers can take a lesson from this man. it is not vulgar.
Not only is the film awesome, it was sent quickly, well protected and in mint shape.  Thanks for your great help!

I've seen a recent broadcast of this movie, and wanted to own it on DVD.  This isn't a studio quality release, but a disappointing copy seemingly made from tape.  The contrast and resolution are poor and the picture occasionally jumps as if it originated from a worn out film.  Next time it airs, I'm going to record it and burn my own DVD.  Unfortunately, there isn't any other source for this film, so this is as good as it will get.
